name: NumberInput
description: A numeric input component with increment/decrement controls, step support, and min/max constraints

accessibility.screenReader: Announces current value, minimum, maximum. Value changes are announced. Buttons have descriptive labels.

recommendedUsage: Use for precise numeric input with increment/decrement controls. Supports formatting with prefix/suffix.
antiPatterns: Do not use for imprecise ranges - use Slider instead. Avoid for non-numeric input.
